<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Agreement of Merger</u>.&#160; The Agreement of Merger, duly executed by
Target;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Stock Certificates</u>.&#160; All certificates representing shares of Outstanding
Target Common Stock;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Releases</u>.&#160; Releases from all Target Shareholders substantially in the form
attached hereto as <u>Exhibit&nbsp;C</u>;</h3>

<h3 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Books and Records</u>.&#160; The Books and Records;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Certificate of Representations and
Warranties</u>.&#160; A certificate executed
on behalf of Target by its Chief Executive Officer, certifying to the matters
in <u>Section&nbsp;9.1(a)</u>;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Certificate of Good Standing</u>.&#160; A certificate from the Secretary of State of
the State of California as to the Target&#146;s good standing and payment of all
applicable taxes;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Opinion of Counsel</u>.&#160; An opinion of Target&#146;s counsel,
substantially in the form attached hereto as <u>Exhibit&nbsp;D</u>; and</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Additional Documents</u>.&#160; Such other certificates, instruments or
documents required pursuant to the provisions of this Agreement or otherwise
necessary or appropriate to consummate the Merger.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">3.3 <a name="Deliveries">Deliveries</a> by
Overland and Acquisition Sub.</font></b>&#160; On the Closing Date, Overland and
Acquisition Sub shall deliver to the Target Shareholders: (i) a certificate
executed on behalf of Overland and Acquisition Sub by their respective Chief
Executive Officers, certifying to the matters in <u>Section&nbsp;9.2(a)</u>;
(ii) the Cash Consideration, less the respective portions of the Cash Consideration
to be withheld by Overland pursuant to the last sentence of <u>Section&nbsp;2.2</u>;
(iii) certificates representing the Overland Merger Shares; and (iv) an opinion
of Overland&#146;s counsel, substantially in the form attached hereto as <u>Exhibit
E</u>.&#160; The Parties agree to the final
calculation of the Cash Consideration and the Overland Merger Shares that is
reflected on <u>Schedule&nbsp;3.3</u> attached hereto.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h1 style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:-1.25in;"><a name="Article4"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE 4</font></b></a>.&#160; REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF TARGET AND TARGET SHAREHOLDERS</h1>

<h1 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.25in;page-break-after:auto;text-indent:-1.25in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h1>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Except as specifically set forth on <u>Schedule&nbsp;4</u> (the &#147;<u>Target
Disclosure Schedule</u>&#148;) attached to this Agreement (the parts of which are
numbered to correspond to the individual section&nbsp;numbers of this <u>Article&nbsp;4</u>),
Target and each of the Key Shareholders hereby represent and warrant, jointly
and severally, and each of the Non-Key Shareholders hereby represents and
warrants severally, to Overland and Acquisition Sub that on the date of this
Agreement and as of the Closing Date as though the following representations
and warranties were made on the Closing Date:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.1 <a name="Organization">Organization</a>,
Good Standing, Qualification.</font></b>Target: (i)&nbsp;is a
corporation duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the
laws of the State of California; (ii)&nbsp;is duly qualified to conduct
business and is in corporate and tax good standing under the laws of each
jurisdiction in which the nature of its business (including, without
limitation, the Business), the operation of its assets or the ownership or
leasing of its properties (including, without limitation, all real and personal
property) requires such qualification, except where the failure to qualify
would not have a Material Adverse Effect; and (iii)&nbsp;has the power and
authority required to own, lease and operate its assets and to carry on its
business (including, without limitation, the Business) as now being conducted.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='4',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.3pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.2 <a name="Charter">Charter</a> Documents; Books and Records.</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target has delivered to Overland accurate,
correct and complete copies of: (i)&nbsp;Target&#146;s Articles of Incorporation and
Bylaws, including all amendments thereto, as presently in effect; (ii)&nbsp;all
stock records of Target, including Target&#146;s stock ledger and copies of any
stock certificates issued by Target; (iii)&nbsp;all minutes and other records
of all meetings and other proceedings (including, without limitation, any
actions taken by written consent or otherwise without a meeting) of Target&#146;s
shareholders and Target&#146;s Board and all committees thereof (collectively, the &#147;<u>Resolutions</u>&#148;);
and (iv)&nbsp;all books of account and other financial records of Target.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target&#146;s minute book accurately and completely
reflects all material corporate actions of Target&#146;s shareholders and Target&#146;s
Board and all committees thereof.&#160;
Target&#146;s books of account and other financial records are accurate and
complete and have been maintained in accordance with reasonably sound business
practices.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target is not in violation of any of the
provisions of its Articles of Incorporation, Bylaws or the Resolutions, and no
condition or circumstance exists that likely would (with or without notice or
lapse of time) constitute or result directly or indirectly in such a violation.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.3 <a name="Capitalization">Capitalization</a>.</font></b></h2>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The authorized capital stock of Target
consists of One Hundred Fifty Million (150,000,000) shares of capital stock,
consisting of One Hundred Million (100,000,000)<b><font style="font-weight:bold;">  </font></b>shares of authorized Common Stock, no par value per share (&#147;<u>Target
Common Stock</u>&#148;), and Fifty Million (50,000,000) shares of authorized
Preferred Stock, no par value per share (&#147;<u>Target Preferred Stock</u>&#148;).&#160; Target has issued and outstanding Eight
Million Three Hundred Thousand (8,300,000) shares of Target Common Stock and no
shares of Target Preferred Stock.&#160; <u>Schedule&nbsp;2.3</u>
sets forth the name of each holder of capital stock of Target and the respective
number and class of shares held by such holder.&#160; No other shares of capital stock are issued or outstanding.&#160; All issued and outstanding shares of capital
stock of, or beneficial interests in, Target have been duly authorized and
validly issued, are fully paid and nonassessable, have been issued in full
compliance with all applicable securities laws and other applicable Legal
Requirements and are free and clear of all Encumbrances.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Except as set forth on <u>Schedule&nbsp;4.3(b)</u>,
there is no: (i)&nbsp;outstanding preemptive right, subscription, option, call,
warrant or other right to acquire any securities of Target;
(ii)&nbsp;outstanding security, instrument or obligation that is or may become
convertible into or exchangeable for any securities of Target; (iii)&nbsp;Contract
under which Target is or may become obligated to sell, issue or otherwise
dispose of or redeem, purchase or otherwise acquire any of its securities; or
(iv)&nbsp;shareholder agreement, voting trust or other agreement, arrangement
or understanding that may affect the exercise of voting or any other rights
with respect to the capital stock of Target.&#160;
Except as set forth on <u>Schedule&nbsp;4.3(b)</u>, the execution of
this Agreement and the consummation of the Merger will not give any rise to any
acceleration or change in the award, grant, vesting or determination of
options, warrants, rights, severance payments or other contingent obligations
of any nature whatsoever of Target in favor of any Person, in any such case as
a result of the change in control of Target or otherwise resulting from the
Merger.</h3>

<h3 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='5',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.4 <a name="Authority">Authority</a>; Binding
Nature of Agreements.</font></b>&#160;
Target has all requisite power and authority to execute and deliver this
Agreement and all other Transaction Documents to which it is a party and to
carry out the provisions of this Agreement and the other Transaction
Documents.&#160; The execution, delivery and
performance by Target of this Agreement and the other Transaction Documents
have been approved by all requisite action on the part of Target.&#160; This Agreement has been duly and validly
executed and delivered by Target.&#160; Each
of this Agreement and the other Transaction Documents to which Target is a
party constitutes, or upon execution and delivery, will constitute, the legal,
valid and binding obligation of Target, enforceable against Target in
accordance with its terms, except as may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency,
reorganization, moratorium and other similar laws and equitable principles
related to or limiting creditors&#146; rights generally and by general principles of
equity.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.5 <a name="NoConflicts">No Conflicts</a>;
Required Consents.</font></b>The execution, delivery and
performance of this Agreement or any other Transaction Document do not and will
not (with or without notice or lapse of time):</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>conflict with, violate or result in any
breach of: (i)&nbsp;any of the provisions of Target&#146;s Articles of Incorporation
or Bylaws; (ii)&nbsp;any of the Resolutions; (iii)&nbsp;any of the terms or
requirements of any Governmental Approval held by Target or any of Target&#146;s employees
or that otherwise relates to the Business or Target; or (iv)&nbsp;any provision
of any Target Contract;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>give any Governmental Authority or other
Person the right to: (i)&nbsp;challenge the Merger; (ii)&nbsp;exercise any
remedy or obtain any relief under any Legal Requirement or any Order to which
Target or the Business is subject; (iii)&nbsp;declare a default of, exercise
any remedy under, accelerate the performance of, cancel, terminate, modify or
receive any payment under any Target Contract; or (iv)&nbsp;revoke, suspend or
modify any Governmental Approval;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>cause Target, Overland or Acquisition Sub to
become subject to, or to become liable for the payment of, any Tax of Target,
except for the Target Shareholder Closing Taxes;</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>result in the imposition or creation of any
Encumbrance upon or with respect to any of the assets of Target; or</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>require Target to obtain any Consent or make
or deliver any filing or notice to a Governmental Authority.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.6 <a name="Subsidiaries">Subsidiaries</a>.</font></b>&#160; Target does not own any shares of capital stock,
other securities or other interest in any Entity, does not have the right to
acquire any such interest, and does not control, directly or indirectly, any
Entity.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.7 <a name="FinancialStatements">Financial Statements</a>.</font></b></h2>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target has previously delivered to Overland
the following financial statements (collectively, the &#147;<u>Financial Statements</u>&#148;):&#160; (i)&nbsp;the unaudited balance sheet and the
related unaudited statement of operations of Target as of and for the fiscal
year ended December&nbsp;31, 2002, together with the notes thereto; and
(ii)&nbsp;the unaudited balance sheet and the related unaudited statement of
operations of Target (the &#147;<u>Interim Balance Sheet</u>&#148;) as of and for the
five months ended May&nbsp;31, 2003 (the &#147;<u>Interim Balance Sheet Date</u>&#148;).</h3>

<h3 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='6',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>All of the Financial Statements: (i)&nbsp;are
true, accurate and complete in all respects; (ii)&nbsp;are consistent with the
Books and Records; and (iii)&nbsp;present fairly and accurately the financial
condition of Target as of the respective dates thereof and the results of
operations of Target for the periods covered thereby.&#160; All reserves established by Target and set forth in the Interim
Balance Sheet are adequate for the purposes for which they were established.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Target Disclosure Schedule&nbsp;sets
forth an accurate, correct and complete breakdown and aging of each of the
accounts payable of Target (including, without limitation, to all of its
suppliers) as of the end of the most recent calendar month.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.8 <a name="Absence">Absence</a> of
Undisclosed Liabilities.</font></b>&#160; Target does not have any Liabilities other than: (i)&nbsp;those
set forth in the Interim Balance Sheet; (ii)&nbsp;those incurred in the
Ordinary Course of Business and not required to be set forth in the Interim
Balance Sheet under GAAP; (iii)&nbsp;those incurred in the Ordinary Course of
Business since the date of the Interim Balance Sheet; (iv)&nbsp;those incurred
by virtue of Target&#146;s execution of the Transaction Documents; and (v) those set
forth in the Target Disclosure Schedule.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.9 <a name="AbsenceOfChanges">Absence of
Changes</a>.</font></b>&#160;
Since the Interim Balance Sheet Date: (i)&nbsp;Target has conducted its
operations and its business (including, without limitation, the Business) in
the Ordinary Course of Business; (ii)&nbsp;no event or circumstance has
occurred that could reasonably have a Material Adverse Effect on Target; and
(iii)&nbsp;Target has not taken any action, agreed to take any action, or
omitted to take any action that would constitute a breach of <u>Section&nbsp;6.1</u>
or <u>6.2</u> if such action or omission were taken between the date of this
Agreement and the Closing Date.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.10</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="TransactionsWithAffiliates">Transactions with Affiliates</a>.</b>&#160; Except as set forth in the Financial
Statements, no Affiliate of Target: (a)&nbsp;owns, directly or indirectly, any
debt, equity or other interest in any Entity with which Target is affiliated,
has a business relationship or competes, other than Affiliates that own less
than five percent (5%) of the issued and outstanding capital stock of a
publicly-traded competitor of Target; (b)&nbsp;is indebted to Target, nor is
Target indebted (or committed to make loans or extend or guarantee credit) to
any Affiliate other than with respect to any of the obligations of Target to
pay accrued salaries, reimbursable expenses or other standard employee
benefits; (c)&nbsp;has any direct or indirect interest in any asset, property
or other right used in the conduct of or otherwise related to the Business or
Target; (d)&nbsp;has any claim or right against Target, and no event has
occurred, and no condition or circumstance exists, that might (with or without
notice or lapse of time) directly or indirectly give rise to or serve as a
basis for any claim or right in favor of any Affiliate against Target;
(e)&nbsp;is a party to any Target Contract or has had any direct or indirect
interest in, any Target Contract, transaction or business dealing of any nature
involving Target; or (f)&nbsp;received from or furnished to Target any goods or
services (with or without consideration) since the Interim Balance Sheet Date.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.11</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="AccountsReceivable">Accounts Receivable</a>.</b>&#160; <u>Schedule&nbsp;4.11</u> sets forth an accurate and complete
list of all Receivables existing as of May&nbsp;31, 2003.&#160; Each Receivable is: (i)&nbsp;a valid and
legally binding obligation of the account debtor enforceable in accordance with
its terms, free and clear of all Encumbrances, and not subject to setoffs,
adverse claims, counterclaims, assessments, defaults, prepayments, defenses,
and conditions precedent; (ii)&nbsp;a true and correct statement of the account
for merchandise actually sold and delivered to, or for services actually
performed for and accepted by, such account debtor; and (iii)&nbsp;fully
collectible and will be collected within sixty (60)</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='7',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">days, subject to trade
discounts provided in the Ordinary Course of Business and any allowance for
doubtful accounts contained in the Interim Balance Sheet.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.12</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Inventor">Inventor</a>y.</b>&#160; All of
the items in Target&#146;s Inventory are: (a)&nbsp;of good and merchantable quality,
fit for the purpose for which they are intended, and saleable and useable in
the Ordinary Course of Business; (b)&nbsp;free of material defects and damage;
and (c) in quantities adequate and not excessive in relation to the
circumstances of the business of Target (including, without limitation, the
Business) and in accordance with the past inventory stocking practices of
Target.&#160; All of the items in Target&#146;s
Inventory meet the current standards and specifications of Target.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h2 style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.13</font></b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</font><a name="MaterialContracts">Material Contracts</a>.</h2>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><u>Schedule&nbsp;4.13</u> sets forth an
accurate, correct and complete list of all Target Contracts to which any of the
descriptions set forth below may apply (the &#147;<u>Material Contracts</u>&#148;):</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Real
Property Leases, Personal Property Leases, Insurance Policies, Contracts
affecting any Target Intellectual Property or Target&#146;s information systems or
software, Contracts with Contractors, the Target Benefit Plans and Governmental
Approvals;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract for capital expenditures or for the purchase of goods or services in
excess of $10,000, except those incurred in the Ordinary Course of Business and
to be performed in three&nbsp;(3) months or less;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract obligating Target to sell or deliver any product or service at a price
which does not cover the cost (including, without limitation, labor, materials
and production overhead) plus the customary profit margin associated with such
product or service;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract involving financing or borrowing of money, or evidencing indebtedness,
any liability for borrowed money, any obligation for the deferred purchase
price of property in excess of $10,000 (excluding normal trade payables) or
guaranteeing in any way any Contract in connection with any Person;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
joint venture, partnership, cooperative arrangement or any other Contract
involving a sharing of profits;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
advertising Contract not terminable without payment or penalty on
thirty&nbsp;(30) days (or less) notice;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(vii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract affecting any right, title or interest in or to real property;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(viii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract with any Governmental Authority;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ix)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract with respect to the discharge, storage or removal of effluent, waste
or pollutants;</h4>

<h4 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></h4>


<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></h4>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<h4 align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(x)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract relating to any license or royalty arrangement;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
power of attorney, proxy or similar instrument;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract among any shareholders of Target;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xiii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract for the manufacture, service or maintenance of any product of Target;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xiv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract for the purchase or sale of any assets other than in the Ordinary
Course of Business or for the option or preferential rights to purchase or sell
any assets;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
requirement or output Contract;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xvi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract to indemnify any Person or to share in or contribute to the liability
of any Person;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xvii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract for the purchase or sale of foreign currency or otherwise involving
foreign exchange transactions;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xviii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract containing covenants not to compete in any line of business or with
any Person in any geographical area;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xix)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
Contract related to the acquisition of a business or the equity of any other
Entity;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xx)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
other Contract which (i)&nbsp;provides for payment or performance by either
party thereto having an aggregate value of $10,000 or more; (ii)&nbsp;is not
terminable without payment or penalty on thirty&nbsp;(30) days (or less)
notice; or (iii)&nbsp;is between, <i><font style="font-style:italic;">inter alia</font></i>,
Target and any of its Affiliates;</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xxi)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
other Contract that involves future payments, performance of services or
delivery of goods or materials to or by Target of an aggregate amount or value
in excess of $10,000, on an annual basis, or that otherwise is material to the
business or prospects of Target; and</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h4 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(xxii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Any
proposed arrangement of a type that, if entered into, would be a Contract
described in any of (i) through (xxi) above.</h4>

<h4 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h4>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target has delivered to Overland accurate,
correct and complete copies of all Material Contracts (or written summaries of
the material terms thereof, if not in writing), including, without limitation,
all amendments, supplements, modifications and waivers thereof.&#160; All nonmaterial contracts of Target do not,
in the aggregate, represent a material portion of the Liabilities of Target.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Each Target Contract is currently valid and
in full force and effect, and is enforceable in accordance with its terms
(assuming that each such Target Contract is enforceable</h3>

<h3 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">in accordance
with its terms against all parties thereto other than Target), except as may be
limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium and other similar
laws and equitable principles related to or limiting creditors&#146; rights
generally and by general principles of equity.&#160;
No Material Contract contains any term or provision that is
extraordinary or that is otherwise not customarily found in Contracts entered
into by comparable Entities.</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(d)&#160;
(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target
is not in default, and no Person has notified Target that it is in default,
under any Target Contract.&#160; No event has
occurred, and no circumstance or condition exists, that might (with or without
notice or lapse of time): (a)&nbsp;result in a violation or breach of any of
the provisions of any Target Contract by Target; (b)&nbsp;give any Person the
right to declare a default or exercise any remedy under any Target Contract;
(c)&nbsp;give any Person the right to accelerate the maturity or performance of
any Target Contract or to cancel, terminate or modify any Target Contract; or
(d)&nbsp;otherwise have a Material Adverse Effect on Target in connection with
any Target Contract; and</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target
has not waived any of its rights under any Target Contract.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(e)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>To the Knowledge of Target and the Target
Shareholders, each Person against which Target has or may acquire any rights
under any Target Contract is (i)&nbsp;solvent and (ii)&nbsp;able to satisfy
such Person&#146;s material obligations and liabilities to Target.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(f)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The performance of the Target Contracts
will not result in any violation of or failure by Target to comply with any
Legal Requirement.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(g)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Material Contracts constitute all of the
Contracts reasonably necessary to enable Acquisition Sub to conduct Target&#146;s
business (including, without limitation, the Business) in the manner in which
such business currently is being conducted.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.14</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Insurance">Insurance</a>.</b>&#160;
Target has not obtained any insurance policies.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">4.15</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Title">Title</a>; Sufficiency; Condition of Assets.</b></p>

<h2 style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 4.5pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;">&nbsp;</font></b></h2>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>Target has good and marketable title to, is
the exclusive legal and equitable owner of, and has the unrestricted power and
right to sell, assign and deliver all of its personal property, interests in
personal property and assets reflected in the Financial Statements or acquired
after the Interim Balance Sheet Date (collectively, the &#147;<u>Target Assets</u>&#148;).&#160; All of the Target Assets with a book value
of $10,000 or more are listed on <u>Schedule&nbsp;4.15</u>.&#160; The Target Assets are free and clear of all
Encumbrances of any kind or nature, except: (a)&nbsp;restrictions imposed in
any Governmental Approval; and (b)&nbsp;Encumbrances disclosed on <u>Schedule&nbsp;4.15</u>
that will be removed and released at or prior to the Closing Date.&#160; At the Effective Time, Acquisition Sub will
acquire exclusive, good and marketable title or license to or a valid leasehold
interest in (as the case may be) the Target Assets and no restrictions will
exist on Acquisition Sub&#146;s right to resell, license or sublicense any of the
Target Assets or engage in the Business.</h3>

<h3 style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<h3 style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font>The Target Assets include all the assets
reasonably necessary to permit Acquisition Sub to conduct the business of
Target (including, without limitation, the Business) in a manner substantially
equivalent to the manner as it is being conducted on the date of this Agreement
in compliance with all Legal Requirements.</h3>

<h3 align="center" style="font-weight:normal;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></h3>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>
