<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .75in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 31.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If to any of the Target Shareholders, to their respective addresses set
forth on <u>Schedule&nbsp;2.3</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 31.7pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.5</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Further">Further</a> Assurances.</b>&#160;
Each Party agrees (a)&nbsp;to furnish upon request to each other Party
such further information, (b)&nbsp;to execute and deliver to each other Party
such other documents, and (c)&nbsp;to do such other acts and things, all as
another Party may reasonably request for the purpose of carrying out the intent
of this Agreement and the Merger.</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">42</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='42',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.6</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Governing">Governing</a> Law.</b>&#160;
This Agreement shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the
internal laws of the State of California, without giving effect to any choice
of law rule that would cause the application of the laws of any jurisdiction
other than the internal laws of the State of California to the rights and
duties of the Parties.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.7</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Amendment">Amendment</a>; Waiver.</b>&#160;
This Agreement shall not amended except by a writing executed by all of
the Parties, except for the amendment to <u>Schedule&nbsp;2.3</u> provided in <u>Section&nbsp;6.11</u>,
which shall require only the signatures of Target and Overland.&#160; Any Party may waive compliance by the other
Party with any of the covenants or conditions herein, but no waiver shall be
binding unless such waiver is in a writing executed by the Party making such
waiver.&#160; No waiver of any of the
provisions of this Agreement shall be deemed, or shall constitute, a waiver of
any other provision, whether or not similar, nor shall any waiver constitute a
continuing waiver.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.8</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Entire">Entire</a> Agreement.</b>&#160;
This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement of the Parties relating
to the subject matter hereof.&#160; Any prior
oral or written agreements, promises, negotiations or representations not
expressly set forth in this Agreement are hereby rendered void and of no force
or effect.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.9</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Captions">Captions</a> and Headings.</b>&#160;
The captions or headings of the provisions of this Agreement are for
reference only and are not to be construed in any way as part of this
Agreement.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">12.10</font></b><b><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><a name="Counterparts">Counterparts</a>.</b>&#160;
This Agreement may be executed in two or more counterparts, each of
which shall be deemed an original, but all of which shall constitute one and
the same instrument.&#160; A Party may
execute and deliver this Agreement by transmitting a facsimile copy of the
executed signature page to the Parties.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">[Signatures Follow On a Separate Page]</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">43</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='43',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF,</font></b>
each of the Parties has caused this Agreement to be executed as of the date
first above written.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

  <p style="font-size:1.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" colspan="8" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.9%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Robert Farkaly</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.1%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" colspan="8" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.9%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.1%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" colspan="8" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:48.9%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.1%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="42%" colspan="4" valign="top" style="border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:42.72%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="6%" colspan="4" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:6.18%;">
  <p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;">&nbsp;</p>
  </td>

 <tr>
  <td width="51%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:51.1%;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

MERGER<br>
DATED AS OF JUNE&nbsp;20, 2003]</font></p>

</font></div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[SIGNATURE PAGE TO AGREEMENT AND PLAN OF
MERGER<br>
DATED AS OF JUNE&nbsp;20, 2003]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name="Exhibita"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT&nbsp;A</font></u></b></a></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name="Certaina"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CERTAIN</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> DEFINITIONS</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Acquisition Sub</u>&#148; shall mean Okapi Acquisition Co., Inc., a
California corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Affiliate</u>&#148; shall mean, with respect to any Person, any member
of the immediate family (including, without limitation, spouse, brother,
sister, descendant, ancestor or in-law) of any officer, director or shareholder
of such Person or any corporation, partnership, trust or other entity in which
such Person or any such family member has a five percent (5%) or greater
interest or is a director, officer, partner or trustee.&#160; The term Affiliate also shall also include any
Entity which controls, or is controlled by, or is under common control with any
of the individuals or entities described in the preceding sentence.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Agreement</u>&#148; shall mean the Agreement and Plan of Merger to which
this <u>Exhibit&nbsp;A</u> is attached (including the Target Disclosure
Schedule, the Overland Disclosure Schedule&nbsp;and all other schedules and
exhibits attached hereto), as it may be amended from time to time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Agreement of Merger</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;1.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Antitrust Division</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;6.8</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Books and Records</u>&#148; shall mean all books, files, papers,
agreements, correspondence, databases, information systems, programs, software,
documents, records and documentation thereof used in the conduct of the
business of, or otherwise relating to, Target, on whatever medium.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Business</u>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in the first
Recital.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Business Day</u>&#148; shall mean any day other than (i)&nbsp;a Saturday
or a Sunday or (ii)&nbsp;a day on which banking and savings and loan
institutions in San Diego, California are authorized or required by law to be
closed.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Cash Consideration</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;2.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Closing</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;3.1</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Closing Date</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;3.1</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Code</u>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in the third Recital.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Competing Party</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;6.3</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Competing Transaction</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;6.3</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Competitive Activity</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.3(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Confidential Information</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.3(h)</u>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Consent</u>&#148; shall mean any approval, consent, ratification,
permission, waiver or authorization (including, without limitation, any
Governmental Approval).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contract</u>&#148; shall mean any agreement, contract, consensual
obligation, promise, understanding, arrangement, commitment or undertaking of
any nature (whether written or oral and whether express or implied), whether or
not legally binding.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Contractors</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.20(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Copyrights</u>&#148; shall mean all copyrights, including, without
limitation, in and to works of authorship and all other rights corresponding
thereto throughout the world, whether published or unpublished, including,
without limitation, rights to prepare, reproduce, perform, display and
distribute copyrighted works and copies, compilations and derivative works
thereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Damages</u>&#148; shall mean and include any actual loss, damage,
injury, Liability, claim, demand, settlement, judgment, award, fine, penalty,
Tax, fee (including, without limitation, any legal fee, accounting fee, expert
fee or advisory fee), charge, cost (including, without limitation, any cost of
investigation) or expense of any nature, except for decline in value, lost
opportunity, lost profits, punitive damages or special and consequential
damages of any nature.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Defined Benefit Plan</u>&#148; shall mean either a plan described in
Section&nbsp;3(35) of ERISA or a plan subject to the minimum funding standards
set forth in Section&nbsp;302 of ERISA and Section&nbsp;412 of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Disposition</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.31(f)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Effective Time</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;1.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Employee Benefit Plan</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in
Section&nbsp;3(3) of ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Encumbrance</u>&#148; shall mean any lien, pledge, hypothecation,
charge, mortgage, security interest, encumbrance, equity, trust, equitable
interest, claim, preference, right of possession, lease, tenancy, license,
encroachment, covenant, infringement, interference, Order, proxy, option, right
of first refusal, preemptive right, community property interest, legend,
defect, impediment, exception, reservation, limitation, impairment, imperfection
of title, condition or restriction of any nature (including, without
limitation, any restriction on the voting of any security, any restriction on
the transfer of any security or other asset, any restriction on the receipt of
any income derived from any asset, any restriction on the use of any asset and
any restriction on the possession, exercise or transfer of any other attribute
of ownership of any asset).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Entity</u>&#148; shall mean any corporation (including, without
limitation, any non-profit corporation), general partnership, limited
partnership, limited liability partnership, joint venture, estate, trust or
company (including, without limitation, any limited liability company or joint
stock company).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Environmental and Safety Law</u>&#148; shall mean any federal, state or
local laws, ordinances, codes, regulations, rules, policies and orders that are
intended to assure the protection of the environment, or that classify,
regulate, call for the remediation of, require reporting with respect to, or
list or define air, water, groundwater, solid waste, hazardous or toxic
substances, materials,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\jms\rcheney\03-3540-1\task28094\3540-1-ke.htm',USER='rcheney',CD='Sep 23 12:35 2003' -->
<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">wastes, pollutants or contaminants, or which are intended to assure the
safety of employees, workers or other persons, including, without limitation,
the public.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>ERISA</u>&#148; shall mean the Employee Retirement Income Security Act
of 1974, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Financial Statements</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.7(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>FTC</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;6.8</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>GAAP</u>&#148; shall mean United States generally accepted accounting
principles in effect on the date on which they are to be applied pursuant to
this Agreement, applied consistently throughout the relevant periods.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Governmental Approval</u>&#148; shall mean any:&#160; (a)&nbsp;permit, license, certificate,
concession, approval, consent, ratification, permission, clearance,
confirmation, exemption, waiver, franchise, certification, designation, rating,
registration, variance, qualification, accreditation or authorization issued,
granted, given or otherwise made available by or under the authority of any
Governmental Authority or pursuant to any Legal Requirement; or (b)&nbsp;right
under any Contract with any Governmental Authority.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Governmental Authority</u>&#148; shall mean any:&#160; (a)&nbsp;nation, principality, state,
commonwealth, province, territory, county, municipality, district or other
jurisdiction of any nature; (b)&nbsp;federal, state, local, municipal, foreign
or other government; (c)&nbsp;Governmental Authority or quasi governmental
authority of any nature (including, without limitation, any governmental
division, subdivision, department, agency, bureau, branch, office, commission,
council, board, instrumentality, officer, official, representative,
organization, unit, body or Entity and any court or other tribunal);
(d)&nbsp;multinational organization or body; or (e) individual, Entity or body
exercising, or entitled to exercise, any executive, legislative, judicial,
administrative, regulatory, police, military or taxing authority or power of
any nature.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Hazardous Materials</u>&#148; shall mean any toxic or hazardous
substance, material or waste or any pollutant or contaminant, or infectious or
radioactive substance or material, including without limitation, those
substances, materials and wastes defined in or regulated under any
Environmental and Safety Laws, but excluding ordinary office and cleaning
supplies and solvents.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>HSR Act</u>&#148; shall mean the Hart Scott Rodino Antitrust
Improvements Act of 1976, as amended, and the rules and regulations thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Indemnitee</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;11.4</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Indemnitor</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;11.4</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Indemnity Basket</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;11.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Intellectual Property Rights</u>&#148; shall mean any or all rights in
and to intellectual property and intangible industrial property rights,
including, without limitation: (i)&nbsp;Patents, Trade Secrets,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Copyrights, Mask Works and Trademarks; and (ii)&nbsp;any rights
similar, corresponding or equivalent to any of the foregoing anywhere in the
world.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Interim Balance Sheet</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.7(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Interim Balance Sheet Date</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in
<u>Section&nbsp;4.7(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Inventory</u>&#148; shall mean all inventory of the Target Products and
its components, wherever located and whether held by Target or third parties,
including, without limitation, all raw materials, work in process, samples,
packaging, supplies, service parts, purchased parts and goods, damaged or
fragmented inventory and the finished goods.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>IRS</u>&#148; shall mean the Internal Revenue Service.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Key Shareholders</u>&#148; shall mean John Matze, Michael Reider, Ross
Rattray and Robert Farkalay.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Knowledge</u>&#148;&#160; An
individual shall be deemed to have &#147;Knowledge&#148; of a particular fact or other
matter if:&#160; (i)&nbsp;such individual
actually is aware of such fact or other matter; or (ii)&nbsp;a prudent
individual could be expected to discover or otherwise become aware of such fact
or other matter as the result of his or her position and duties.&#160; An Entity shall be deemed to have
&#147;Knowledge&#148; of a particular fact or other matter if any of its directors,
officers or employees with the authority to establish policy for such Entity
has Knowledge of such fact or other matter.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Legal Requirement</u>&#148; shall mean any federal, state, local,
municipal, foreign or other law, statute, legislation, constitution, principle
of common law, resolution, ordinance, code, Order, edict, decree, proclamation,
treaty, convention, rule, regulation, permit, ruling, directive, pronouncement,
requirement (licensing or otherwise), specification, determination, decision,
opinion or interpretation that is, has been or may in the future be issued,
enacted, adopted, passed, approved, promulgated, made, implemented or otherwise
put into effect by or under the authority of any Governmental Authority.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Liability</u>&#148; shall mean any debt, obligation, duty or liability
of any nature (including, without limitation, any unknown, undisclosed,
unmatured, unaccrued, unasserted, contingent, indirect, conditional, implied,
vicarious, derivative, joint, several or secondary liability), regardless of
whether such debt, obligation, duty or liability would be required to be
disclosed on a balance sheet prepared in accordance with generally accepted
accounting principles and regardless of whether such debt, obligation, duty or
liability is immediately due and payable.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Machinery and Equipment</u>&#148; shall mean all tools, dies, jigs,
molds, patterns, machinery and equipment (including, without limitation,
manufacturing assembly and test equipment), wherever located and whether held
by the Target or third parties.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Mask Works</u>&#148; shall mean all mask works, mask work registrations
and applications therefor, and any equivalent or similar rights in semiconductor
masks, layouts, architectures or topology.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Material Adverse Effect</u>&#148; shall mean: (i)&nbsp;with respect to
Overland and the Acquisition Sub, any event, change or effect that, when taken
individually or together with all other adverse events, changes and effects, is
or is reasonably likely (a)&nbsp;to be materially adverse to the condition </font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(financial or otherwise), properties, assets, liabilities, business,
operations, results of operations or prospects of Overland or its subsidiaries,
taken as a whole or (b)&nbsp;to prevent or materially delay consummation of the
Merger or otherwise to prevent Overland or its subsidiaries from performing
their obligations under this Agreement; and (ii)&nbsp;with respect to Target, any
event, change or effect that, when taken individually or together with all
other adverse events, changes and effects, is or is reasonably likely
(a)&nbsp;to be materially adverse to the condition (financial or otherwise),
properties, assets (including, without limitation, the Target Assets),
liabilities, business (including, without limitation, the Business),
operations, results of operations or prospects of the Target, or (b)&nbsp;to
prevent or materially delay consummation of the Merger or otherwise to prevent the
Target from performing its obligations under this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Material Contracts</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.13(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Member of the Controlled Group</u>&#148; shall mean each trade or
business, whether or not incorporated, that would be treated as a single
employer with Target under Section&nbsp;4001 of ERISA or Section&nbsp;414(b),
(c), (m) or (o) of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Merger</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in the second Recital.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Merger Consideration</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;2.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Multiemployer Plan</u>&#148; shall mean a plan described in
Section&nbsp;3(37) of ERISA.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>NDA</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;6.6</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Noncompetition Period</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.3(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Non-Key Shareholders</u>&#148; shall mean the Target Shareholders other
than the Key Shareholders.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Order</u>&#148; shall mean any:&#160;
(a)&nbsp;temporary, preliminary or permanent order, judgment,
injunction, edict, decree, ruling, pronouncement, determination, decision,
opinion, verdict, sentence, stipulation, subpoena, writ or award that is or has
been issued, made, entered, rendered or otherwise put into effect by or under
the authority of any court, administrative agency or other Governmental
Authority or any arbitrator or arbitration panel; or (b)&nbsp;Contract with any
Governmental Authority that is or has been entered into in connection with any
Proceeding.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Ordinary Course of Business</u>&#148; shall describe any action taken by
a Person if: (a)&nbsp;such action is consistent with such Person&#146;s past
practices and is taken in the ordinary course of such Person&#146;s normal day to
day operations; (b)&nbsp;such action is taken in accordance with sound and
prudent business practices; (c)&nbsp;such action is not required to be
authorized by such Person&#146;s shareholders, board of directors or any committee
thereof and does not require any other separate or special authorization of any
nature; and (d)&nbsp;such action is similar in nature and magnitude to actions
customarily taken, without any separate or special authorization, in the
ordinary course of the normal day to day operations of other Entities that are
engaged in businesses similar to such Person&#146;s business.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Outstanding Target Common Sock</u>&#148; shall have the meaning
specified in <u>Section&nbsp;2.1</u>.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Overland</u>&#148; shall mean Overland Storage, Inc., a California
corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Overland Common Stock</u>&#148; shall mean Overland&#146;s Common Stock, no
par value.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Overland Damages</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;11.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Overland Disclosure Schedule</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified
in <u>Article&nbsp;5</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Overland Merger Shares</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;2.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Party</u>&#148; and &#147;<u>Parties</u>&#148; shall have the meanings specified
in the first paragraph of this Agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Patents</u>&#148; shall mean all United States and foreign patents and
utility models and applications therefor and all reissues, divisions,
re-examinations, renewals, extensions, provisionals, continuations and
continuations-in-part thereof, and equivalent or similar rights anywhere in the
world in inventions and discoveries, including, without limitation, invention
disclosures related to the Business or any Target Assets.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Person</u>&#148; shall mean any individual, Entity or Governmental
Authority.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Personal Property</u>&#148; shall mean all personal property, office
furnishings and furniture, display racks, shelves, decorations, supplies and
other tangible personal property.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Personal Property Leases</u>&#148; shall mean all leases of personal
property to which Target is a party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Proceeding</u>&#148; shall mean any action, suit, litigation, arbitration,
proceeding (including, without limitation, any civil, criminal, administrative,
investigative or appellate proceeding), prosecution, contest, hearing, inquiry,
inquest, audit, examination or investigation that is, has been or may in the
future be commenced, brought, conducted or heard at law or in equity or before
any Governmental Authority or any arbitrator or arbitration panel.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Pro Rata Interests</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;2.3</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>PTO</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.17(g)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Public Reports</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.31(b)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Real Property Leases</u>&#148; shall mean all leases of real property to
which Target is a party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Receivables</u>&#148; shall mean all accounts and notes receivable,
checks, negotiable instruments and chattel papers.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Registered Intellectual Property Rights</u>&#148; shall mean all United
States, international and foreign:&#160;
(i)&nbsp;Patents, including applications therefor; (ii)&nbsp;registered
Trademarks, applications to register Trademarks, including intent-to-use
applications, or other registrations or applications related to Trademarks;
(iii)&nbsp;Copyright registrations and applications to register Copyrights;
(iv)&nbsp;Mask Work registrations and applications to register Mask Works; and
(v)&nbsp;any other Intellectual Property Rights that is the subject of an
application, certificate, filing, registration or other</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">6</font></p>


<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">document issued by, filed with, or recorded by, any state, government
or other public legal authority at any time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Registration Statement</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.4(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Representatives</u>&#148; shall mean Affiliates, officers, directors,
employees, attorneys, accountants, advisors, agents, distributors, licensees,
shareholders, subsidiaries and lenders of a Party.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Resolutions</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.2(a)(iii)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Restricted Territory</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.3(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>SEC</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.4(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Securities</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.31(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Securities Act</u>&#148; shall mean the Securities Act of 1933, as
amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Survival Date</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;11.1</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Surviving Corporation</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;1.1</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Suspension Notice</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;7.4(c)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target</u>&#148; shall mean Okapi Software, Inc., a California
corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Assets</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.15(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Benefit Plans</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.21(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Common Stock</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.3(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Contract</u>&#148; shall include any written or oral agreement,
contract, understanding, arrangement, instrument, note, guaranty, mortgage,
indenture, lease, indemnity, deed, assignment, power of attorney, commitment,
covenant, assurance, obligation, promise or undertaking of any nature that is
binding on Target or any of the properties or assets of Target.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Disclosure Schedule</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in
<u>Article&nbsp;4</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Equity Incentive Plan</u>&#148; shall mean the Equity Incentive
Plan of Target.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Intellectual Property</u>&#148; shall mean all Intellectual
Property Rights of Target, whether owned or controlled, licensed, owned or
controlled by or for, licensed to, or otherwise held by or for the benefit of
Target, including, without limitation, the Target Registered Intellectual
Property Rights.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Options</u>&#148; shall mean all outstanding options, whether
vested or unvested, granted, awarded or issued from or under the Target Equity
Incentive Plan.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">7</font></p>

</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Preferred Stock</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.3(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Products</u>&#148; shall mean all products and services
manufactured, made, designed, maintained, supported, developed, sold, licensed,
marketed, or otherwise distributed or provided (or planned to be manufactured,
made, designed, maintained, supported, developed, sold, licensed, marketed, or
otherwise distributed or provided) by or for Target (including, without
limitation, all versions and releases thereof, whether already distributed or
provided, under development or planned), together with any related materials,
information or data, including, without limitation, the names, numbers (e.g.,
part numbers) and packaging associated with such products and services.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Registered Intellectual Property Rights</u>&#148; shall have the
meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;4.17(a)</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target&#146;s Board</u>&#148; shall mean the Board of Directors of the Target.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Shareholder&#148;</u> and &#147;<u>Target Shareholders</u>&#148; shall mean
the individuals identified on <u>Schedule&nbsp;2.3</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Shareholder Closing Taxes</u>&#148; shall have the meaning
specified in <u>Section&nbsp;2.2</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Target Shareholder Damages</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in
<u>Section&nbsp;11.3</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tax</u>&#148; (and, with correlative meaning, &#147;<u>Taxable</u>&#148;) shall
mean any net income, alternative or add-on minimum tax, gross income, gross
receipts, sales, use, ad valorem, transfer, franchise, profits, license,
withholding, payroll, employment, excise, severance, stamp, occupation,
premium, property, environmental or windfall profit tax, custom, duty or other
tax, governmental fee or other assessment or charge of any kind whatsoever,
together with any interest or any penalty, addition to tax or additional amount
and any interest on such penalty, addition to tax or additional amount, imposed
by any Tax Authority.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tax Authority</u>&#148; shall mean Governmental Authority responsible
for the imposition, assessment or collection of any Tax (domestic or foreign).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Tax Return</u>&#148; shall mean any return, statement, declaration,
notice, certificate or other document that is or has been filed with or
submitted to, or required to be filed with or submitted to, any Governmental
Authority in connection with the determination, assessment, collection or
payment of any Tax or in connection with the administration, implementation or
enforcement of or compliance with any Legal Requirement related to any Tax.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Trademarks</u>&#148; shall mean any and all trademarks, service marks,
logos, trade names, corporate names, Internet domain names and addresses and
general-use e-mail addresses, and all goodwill associated therewith throughout
the world.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Trade Secrets</u>&#148; shall mean all trade secrets under applicable
law and other rights in know-how and confidential or proprietary information,
processing, manufacturing or marketing information, including, without
limitation, new developments, inventions, processes, ideas or other proprietary
information that provide Target with advantages over competitors who do not
know</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">or use it and documentation thereof (including, without limitation,
related papers, blueprints, drawings, chemical compositions, formulae, diaries,
notebooks, specifications, designs, methods of manufacture and data processing
software, compilations of information) and all claims and rights related
thereto.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Transaction Documents</u>&#148; shall mean this Agreement and all other
agreements, certificates, instruments, documents and writings delivered by any
of the Parties in connection with the Merger.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Transferred Employees</u>&#148; shall have the meaning specified in <u>Section&nbsp;8.1</u>.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#147;<u>Treasury Regulations</u>&#148; shall mean the regulations promulgated
under the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name="ExhibitB"><b><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">EXHIBIT
B</font></u></b></a></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><a name="Agreement"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">AGREEMENT</font></b></a><b><font style="font-weight:bold;"> OF MERGER</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">THIS AGREEMENT OF MERGER</font></b>
(this &#147;<u>Agreement</u>&#148;) is executed and delivered as of
June&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2003, by and between
Okapi Acquisition Co., Inc., a California corporation (the &#147;<u>Surviving
Corporation</u>&#148;), and Okapi Software, Inc., a California corporation (the &#147;<u>Merging
Corporation</u>&#148;).&#160; The Surviving
Corporation is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Overland Storage, Inc., a
California corporation (the &#147;<u>Parent Corporation</u>&#148;).</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160; The Merging Corporation
shall be merged into the Surviving Corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160; Each outstanding share of
the Merging Corporation shall be converted into
$&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
in cash and
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
shares of the Common Stock of the Parent Corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160; In lieu of fractional shares
of the Common Stock of the Parent Corporation that would otherwise be issued to
any shareholder of the Merging Corporation, each shareholder of the Merging
Corporation who would have been entitled to receive a fractional share shall
receive instead an amount in cash equal to the fair market value of such
fractional share, as determined by the Parent Corporation in accordance with
Section&nbsp;407 of the General Corporation Law of the State of California.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4. &#160;The Merging Corporation
shall from time to time, as and when requested by the Surviving Corporation,
execute and deliver all such documents and instruments and take all such action
necessary or desirable to evidence or carry out the merger described above (the
&#147;<u>Merger</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">5.&#160; The effect of the Merger and
the effective date of the Merger are as prescribed by law.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">IN WITNESS WHEREOF,</font></b>
the parties have executed this Agreement as of the date first above written.</p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<hr size="2" width="100%" noshade color="gray" align="left">

</font></div>

<font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">

</font>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;">&nbsp;</p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">CERTIFICATE OF APPROVAL<br>
OF<br>
AGREEMENT OF MERGER</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Christopher P. Calisi and Vernon A. LoForti certify that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1.&#160; They are the President and
Secretary, respectively, of Okapi Acquisition Co., Inc., a California
corporation (the &#147;<u>Corporation</u>&#148;).&#160;
The Corporation is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Overland Storage, Inc.,
a California corporation (the &#147;<u>Parent Corporation</u>&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2.&#160; The Agreement of Merger in
the form attached was duly approved by the Board of Directors of the
Corporation.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3.&#160; The Agreement of Merger was
entitled to be and was approved by the Board of Directors of the Corporation
alone, pursuant to Section&nbsp;1201 of the General Corporation Law of the
State of California.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4.&#160; No vote of the shareholders
of the Parent Corporation was required.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">We further declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the State
of California that the matters set forth in this certificate are true and
correct of our own knowledge.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
